results.deck: Take control of Brandon to stop the evil jester Malcolm destroying the forest of the country and to recover the Kyragem.
results.description:
Gameplay

Despite not being a very well known adventure game, The Legend of Kyrandia deserves praise for its simplified interface and innovative inventory system which makes for a much more well-rounded and fun experience. All of the 'open', 'push', 'pull' actions were singled down into one 'use' button. The inventory restricted the player from carrying everything they found leading to new puzzles about what objects should I hold on to or what objects do I need to combine.

The Legend of Kyrandia was also notable for the fact that your character would be able to die throughout the course of your adventure. This added significant tension and sometimes frustration to the gameplay, encouraging players to save their games often. Kyrandia also featured an interesting 'spell' system in which players had to find and create different types of gems using alchemy. These gems would have different effects and were central to the story and final fight sequence. This aspect however was also quite challenging and confusing, focusing a lot on trial and error.

Kyrandia's graphics, as evident from the screenshots, were quite impressive for its time period. The backgrounds and setting were beautiful in their art style, and often featured a unique and eye-catching animation when the character walked into an area for the first time. These animations would often direct the player to an important item or event. The characters' animation was also quite smooth and advanced for the time, immersing players seamlessly into the game world.

Plot

In the kingdom of Kyrandia, a mad court jester with magical power abilities has murdered King William and his wife. Malcolm roams the countryside using his magic to destroy the forests and wreck havoc. Brandon (the player) lives in the forest with one of the King's counselors, Kallak. In the beginning of the game Malcolm meets Kallak, turning him into stone, thus setting Brandon on a quest to defeat Malcolm and rescue the Kingdom.
results.name: The Legend of Kyrandia
